request.name: set_grab_surface
request.description: The surface set by this request will receive a fake pointer.enter event during grabs at position 0, 0 and is expected to set an appropriate cursor image as described by the grab_cursor event sent just before the enter event.

request.name: get_menu_surface
request.description: The surface set by this request will receive a fake pointer.enter event during grabs at position 0, 0 and is expected to set an appropriate cursor image as described by the grab_cursor event sent just before the enter event.

event.name: grab_cursor

description.summary: tell client what cursor to show during a grab

event.description: This event will be sent immediately before a fake enter event on the grab surface.

event.name: spawn
event.description: This event will only occur once for each menu tree, submenus should be handled internally.

event.name: despawn
event.description: This event should be ignored if no menu is currently shown.
